page.title: 16ST.PETER'S SCHOOL
page.content: The{St. Peter's Estate}was first {owned by the late Admiral Peter}who also owned much of the land around the school.This area{includes five farms and St. Peter's School.When the Admiral died he{left}it to{a lady {called Mrs.Ball}who now lives in Bedfordshire.The land is therefore {looked after by six trustees}who employ{Michael Hughes}of Exeter to ensure that the buildings that Mrs.Ball owns are well kept.Mrs Ball {leases 11 acres}to St. Peter's school. The{lease expires in 2015. In recent months{four new classrooms {have been added and the school has {been painted.}All these changes have been{done by Brook Brothers.}Soon a temporary changing room will be erected and in years to come a permanent changing room will be added to the sports hall.
